description.narrative: - Help develop critical petroleum products distribution infrastructure in the country that is facing periodic fuel shortages to the lack of affordable petroleum products supply; - Strengthen private sector participation in the oil products supply chain; - Reinforce GoG''s deregulation efforts of the petroleum products distribution sector by supporting development of the private sector owned infrastructure and strengthening competitiveness of a leading private sector player.

This Project involves the construction and operation of a 48,000m/t greenfield petroleum storage facility located in Tema, 29 km East of Accra, the Capital of Ghana, by Quantum Terminal Limited, a subsidiary of the Quantum Group, a leading Ghanaian petroleum products trader.
